about_the_game:
"InstaTok Tycoon " is a blogger simulator in the Tycoon genre that immerses you in the exciting world of digital marketing.

Your goal is to become the owner of a successful blogger promotion agency and create a real empire of influence on social networks.

Creating an Agency:
Start with a small apartment and gradually grow your agency by opening new locations.
Hire talented professionals, create effective marketing strategies and expand your audience.
Run ads on a variety of platforms

Work with Bloggers:
Review resumes among various bloggers with unique skills and content styles.
Evaluate their abilities, choose which genre and platform to post on
Manage their careers to maximize success.
Create courses to learn and improve each blogger's qualities as you wish

Content Promotion:
Work on creating engaging and viral content.
Manage the production of posts, articles and social media posts to keep bloggers interesting and increase their popularity.

Technology Evolution:
Explore new technologies and tools to improve your promotional methods. Track social media trends and adapt to the rapidly changing digital world.
Become a master in blogger promotion, build your Influencer Empire and prove that you are a true titan in the world of digital marketing!

name: InstaTok Tycoon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3-3200U 2.6 Ghz or Intel Core i5-8250U
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX Vega 3 or Intel® UHD Graphics 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 458 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3-3200U 2.6 Ghz or Intel Core i5-8250U
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 550 or NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 458 MB available space

short_description: "InstaTok Tycoon " is a blogger simulator in the Tycoon genre that immerses you in the exciting world of digital marketing.
